Function to generate the sequence of lambdas

Source: R/RcppExports.R
LambdaSeq.Rd

Function to generate the sequence of lambdas

Usage

LambdaSeq(Y, X, n_lambdas = 100L)

Arguments

Y

Numeric matrix. Matrix of dependent variables (Y).

X

Numeric matrix. Matrix of predictors (X).

n_lambdas

Integer. Number of lambdas to generate.

Value

Returns a vector of lambdas.

See also

Other Simulation of Autoregressive Data Functions: FitVARLassoSearch(), FitVARLasso(), FitVAROLS(), OrigScale(), PBootCI(), PBootSE(), PBootVAROLS(), SearchVARLasso(), SelectVARLasso(), SimAR(), SimMVN(), SimVARZIP(), SimVAR(), SimVariance(), StdMat(), YX()

Author

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

Examples

Ystd <- StdMat(vark3p2yx$Y)
Xstd <- StdMat(vark3p2yx$X[, -1])
LambdaSeq(Y = Ystd, X = Xstd, n_lambdas = 100)
